name: Jenifa Terry
title: HUSBAND LOVES IT
reviews: Got this as a gift for my husband and he couldn't be happier. Looks great, super functional, feels durable. 10/10

name: Jones David
title: AMAIZING EXPERIENCE WITH IT
reviews: I'm actually really enjoying the NH-Bagpack. I'm actually using it as my pilots bag. He does a great job of holding all the different items I need Including an iPad and avionics headphones. If I could change anything about it it would be to add magnets to the top flap like I have on my TacSac. Other than that, this is a great sac!

name: Ameer Hasan
title: MY FAVORITE BACKPACK
reviews: This is a fabulous NH-Bagpack for everyday use. More than enough room for your laptop, cables, chargers and just the stuff you need to get through your day. The internal pouch for your laptop does not extend all the way to the bottom of the bag, so you basically get additional storage area at the bottom of the bag while still being able to retrieve your electronics. I use my Man-Bag Damnit inside of the NH-Bagpack as a case for miscellaneous things. Great combination.

name: Jason Hary
title: AMAZING QUALITY AND FEATURES
reviews: Got this bag last year as a gift and, I am in love!! The quality of the bag is amazing, it looks even better, holds everything I need including a 26 oz YETI, admin pouch is a must to fully utilize this bag, but other than that outstanding product and led me to fall in love with many other NH-Bagpacks- admin pouch, MBD, wallet, Dopp kit, and the duffle.

name: Lauri Maxwel
title: VERY EFFICIENT
reviews: I was skeptical at first due to failed work bags unable to hold up. Luckily, NH-Bagpack provided what I needed for a reasonable price. I'm very happy with my purchase and I appreciate the quality and effort.r

name: Jammy Watson
title: ALMOST PERFECT
reviews: Overall the bag is excellent. There is enough room for my MacBook Pro, iPad, accessories, and my Yeti. Although I think the side pockets are useless for a water bottle, there are uses for them. I currently keep my Leatherman MUT on one side. The side zipper is a nice touch. Makes grabbing my Yeti Tumbler that much easier.Overall, I would recommend, and be prepared for this to last a long time.
